        Parameters:

      • encryptText

        public java.lang.String encryptText(java.lang.String text)
        Encrypts the given string with AES and ecodes it in base64 format. The aes_key must be set for this function to work properly.
        Parameters:
        text - string to be encrypted
        Returns:
        encrypted base64 string

      • decryptText

        public java.lang.String decryptText(java.lang.String text)
        Decrypts the given base64 encoded string with AES back into plaintext (no defaults set so far). The aes_key must be set for this function to work properly.
        Parameters:
        text - base64 string to be decrypted
        Returns:
        decrypted string

      • decryptAESKeyWithRSA

        public javax.crypto.SecretKey decryptAESKeyWithRSA(byte[] key)
        Decrypts an AES key given as byte-array and encrypted with the servers public key into an SecretKey object.
        Parameters:
        key - an RSA encrypted AES key
        Returns:
        decrypted AES key as SecretKey object

      • encodeBase64

        Parameters:

        Returns:
